title: Magic Sounds - Volume II
description: Bring your magic to life with these sounds!
longDescription:
Hello Developer!

Bring your visual effects to life with these sound effects! They were designed to be used in the simplest possible way, just import and implement! And the sound quality is extremely professional, ensuring your game goes to the next level when it comes to audio.


Check the documentation

Check the preview


Variety and Quality

You will receive more than 200 audio files, all of them are available both in mono and stereo, and 100 of these are designed, and you will even have access to the layers of these sounds, thus generating a very wide variety of sounds that you can use in the most different situations.


Originality

All sounds were made using the Foley technique along with synthesizers, so the creativity of the process guarantees originality in each sound, making your game sound unique!


Thinking about usability

All files are One Shot, 'Plug and Play' no need to cut, edit, separate files or anything. Just import and be happy! And you also have access to the video and documentation, where you can hear the sound, see the name, and search the worksheet, making it super easy to find the sounds!


helping each other

In addition to receiving everything mentioned in these files, you also help me a lot to continue creating, because your investment motivates me to create more effects.


Support

I make myself available to help with any problems regarding the packages via email.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 224

Number of Audio Cues: 224

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) No

Mac: (Yes/No) No

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: All the sound effects were created using professional equipment and the cover is by NightCafe
